value.value: @concat('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/', pipeline().parameters.owner, '/', pipeline().parameters.repo, '/', pipeline().parameters.branch, '/', if(contains(item().path, item().name), item().path, concat(item().path,'/', item().name)))

scripts.text:
IF OBJECT_ID('dbo.PipelineManifest','U') IS NOT NULL
    DROP TABLE dbo.PipelineManifest;


CREATE TABLE dbo.PipelineManifest
(
    ManifestID INT IDENTITY(1,1) PRIMARY KEY,
    ModuleName        NVARCHAR(128)   NOT NULL,
    SourceFile        NVARCHAR(256)   NOT NULL,
    SourceDataFlow    NVARCHAR(512)   NULL,
    [Layer]           NVARCHAR(64)    NOT NULL,
    [Batch]           NVARCHAR(64)    NULL,
    ParallelGroup     NVARCHAR(128)   NULL,
    [Target]          NVARCHAR(512)   NULL,
    ProcessingPlatform NVARCHAR(128)  NULL,
    DependencyType    NVARCHAR(64)    NULL,
    DependencyStatus  NVARCHAR(64)    NULL,
    Dependencies      NVARCHAR(MAX)   NULL,
    CreatedAt         DATETIME2       NOT NULL DEFAULT SYSUTCDATETIME()
);


BEGIN TRANSACTION;

INSERT INTO dbo.PipelineManifest (ModuleName, SourceFile, SourceDataFlow, [Layer], [Batch], ParallelGroup, [Target], ProcessingPlatform, DependencyType, DependencyStatus, Dependencies)
VALUES
-- DimDate (generated)
(N'Finance', N'DimDate (generated)', N'DimDate (generated)', N'Bronze', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Bronze', N'dimdate.parquet', N'Databricks', N'Parallel', N'Ready', N'none'),
(N'Finance', N'DimDate (generated)', N'dimdate.parquet', N'Silver', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Dims', N'stg.dim.date', N'Databricks', N'Parallel', N'Pending', N'dimdate.parquet (Bronze)'),
(N'Finance', N'DimDate (generated)', N'stg.dim.date', N'Gold', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Gold', N'dbo.DimDate', N'Databricks / Synapse', N'Sequence', N'Blocked', N'stg.dim.date (Silver)'),

-- Account -> DimAccount
(N'Finance', N'Account.csv', N'Account.csv', N'Raw', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Raw', N'Account.parquet', N'ADF', N'Parallel', N'Ready', N'none'),
(N'Finance', N'Account.csv', N'Account.parquet', N'Bronze', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Bronze', N'stg.finance.account', N'Databricks', N'Parallel', N'Pending', N'Account.csv (Raw)'),
(N'Finance', N'Account.csv', N'stg.finance.account', N'Silver', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Dims', N'dbo.DimAccount', N'Databricks / Synapse', N'Sequence', N'Blocked', N'stg.finance.account (Bronze)'),

-- Department -> DimDepartmentGroup
(N'Finance', N'Department.csv', N'Department.csv', N'Raw', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Raw', N'Department.parquet', N'ADF', N'Parallel', N'Ready', N'none'),
(N'Finance', N'Department.csv', N'Department.parquet', N'Bronze', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Bronze', N'stg.hr.department', N'Databricks', N'Parallel', N'Pending', N'Department.csv (Raw)'),
(N'Finance', N'Department.csv', N'stg.hr.department', N'Silver', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Dims', N'dbo.DimDepartmentGroup', N'Databricks / Synapse', N'Sequence', N'Blocked', N'stg.hr.department (Bronze)'),

-- Organization (BusinessEntity / Vendor) -> DimOrganization
(N'Finance', N'BusinessEntity.csv', N'BusinessEntity.csv', N'Raw', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Raw', N'Businessentity.parquet', N'ADF', N'Parallel', N'Ready', N'none'),
(N'Finance', N'BusinessEntity.csv', N'Businessentity.parquet', N'Bronze', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Bronze', N'stg.org.businessentity', N'Databricks', N'Parallel', N'Pending', N'BusinessEntity.csv (Raw)'),
(N'Finance', N'BusinessEntity.csv', N'stg.org.businessentity', N'Silver', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Dims', N'dbo.DimOrganization', N'Databricks / Synapse', N'Sequence', N'Blocked', N'stg.org.businessentity (Bronze); dbo.DimCurrency (Silver) if Currency enrichment required'),

-- Scenario (MISSING OLTP source) -> DimScenario (we will create default)
(N'Finance', N'Scenario (default)', N'Scenario (generated)', N'Raw', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Raw', N'Scenario.parquet', N'Databricks', N'Parallel', N'Ready', N'none'),
(N'Finance', N'Scenario (default)', N'Scenario.parquet', N'Bronze', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Bronze', N'stg.finance.scenario', N'Databricks', N'Parallel', N'Pending', N'Scenario.parquet (Raw)'),
(N'Finance', N'Scenario (default)', N'stg.finance.scenario', N'Silver', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Dims', N'dbo.DimScenario', N'Databricks / Synapse', N'Sequence', N'Blocked', N'stg.finance.scenario (Bronze)'),

-- Purchase Orders as Finance source (fallback if FinanceTransactions.csv not available)
(N'Finance', N'PurchaseOrderHeader.csv', N'PurchaseOrderHeader.csv', N'Raw', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Raw', N'PurchaseOrderHeader.parquet', N'ADF', N'Parallel', N'Ready', N'none'),
(N'Finance', N'PurchaseOrderHeader.csv', N'PurchaseOrderHeader.parquet', N'Bronze', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Bronze', N'stg.poh', N'Databricks', N'Parallel', N'Pending', N'PurchaseOrderHeader.csv (Raw)'),
(N'Finance', N'PurchaseOrderDetail.csv', N'PurchaseOrderDetail.csv', N'Raw', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Raw', N'PurchaseOrderDetail.parquet', N'ADF', N'Parallel', N'Ready', N'none'),
(N'Finance', N'PurchaseOrderDetail.csv', N'PurchaseOrderDetail.parquet', N'Bronze', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Bronze', N'stg.pod', N'Databricks', N'Parallel', N'Pending', N'PurchaseOrderDetail.csv (Raw)'),
(N'Finance', N'PurchaseOrder (staging)', N'stg.poh; stg.pod', N'Silver (staging)', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Staging', N'silver.fact_po_staging', N'Databricks', N'Sequence', N'Blocked', N'stg.poh (Bronze); stg.pod (Bronze)'),
(N'Finance', N'PurchaseOrder (staging)', N'silver.fact_po_staging; dbo.DimAccount; dbo.DimOrganization; dbo.DimDepartmentGroup; dbo.DimScenario; dbo.DimDate', N'Gold', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Gold', N'dbo.FactFinance', N'Synapse / Databricks', N'Sequence', N'Blocked', N'silver.fact_po_staging (Silver); dbo.DimAccount (Silver); dbo.DimOrganization (Silver); dbo.DimDepartmentGroup (Silver); dbo.DimScenario (Silver); dbo.DimDate (Silver)'),

-- TransactionHistory (inventory/cost events) -> optional enrichment to FactFinance
(N'Finance', N'TransactionHistory.csv', N'TransactionHistory.csv', N'Raw', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Raw', N'TransactionHistory.parquet', N'ADF', N'Parallel', N'Ready', N'none'),
(N'Finance', N'TransactionHistory.csv', N'TransactionHistory.parquet', N'Bronze', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Bronze', N'stg.transactionhistory', N'Databricks', N'Parallel', N'Pending', N'TransactionHistory.csv (Raw)'),
(N'Finance', N'TransactionHistory.csv', N'stg.transactionhistory', N'Silver', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Staging', N'silver.inventory_transactions', N'Databricks', N'Sequence', N'Blocked', N'stg.transactionhistory (Bronze)'),
(N'Finance', N'TransactionHistory.csv', N'silver.inventory_transactions; dbo.DimProduct; dbo.DimDate; dbo.DimAccount; dbo.DimOrganization; dbo.DimScenario', N'Gold', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Gold', N'dbo.FactFinance', N'Databricks / Synapse', N'Sequence', N'Blocked', N'silver.inventory_transactions (Silver); dbo.DimProduct (Silver if used); dbo.DimDate (Silver)'),

-- Product/Cost inputs (for account mapping / cost)
(N'Finance', N'Product.csv', N'Product.csv', N'Raw', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Raw', N'Product.parquet', N'ADF', N'Parallel', N'Ready', N'none'),
(N'Finance', N'Product.csv', N'Product.parquet', N'Bronze', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Bronze', N'stg.product', N'Databricks', N'Parallel', N'Pending', N'Product.csv (Raw)'),
(N'Finance', N'ProductCostHistory.csv', N'ProductCostHistory.csv', N'Raw', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Raw', N'ProductCostHistory.parquet', N'ADF', N'Parallel', N'Ready', N'none'),
(N'Finance', N'ProductCostHistory.csv', N'ProductCostHistory.parquet', N'Bronze', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Bronze', N'stg.product.costhistory', N'Databricks', N'Parallel', N'Pending', N'ProductCostHistory.csv (Raw)'),

-- Currency (for FX conversion)
(N'Finance', N'Currency.csv', N'Currency.csv', N'Raw', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Raw', N'Currency.parquet', N'ADF', N'Parallel', N'Ready', N'none'),
(N'Finance', N'Currency.csv', N'Currency.parquet', N'Bronze', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Bronze', N'stg.currency', N'Databricks', N'Parallel', N'Pending', N'Currency.csv (Raw)'),
(N'Finance', N'CurrencyRate.csv', N'CurrencyRate.csv', N'Raw', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Raw', N'CurrencyRate.parquet', N'ADF', N'Parallel', N'Ready', N'none'),
(N'Finance', N'CurrencyRate.csv', N'CurrencyRate.parquet', N'Bronze', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Bronze', N'stg.currency.rate', N'Databricks', N'Parallel', N'Pending', N'CurrencyRate.csv (Raw)'),
(N'Finance', N'CurrencyRate.csv', N'stg.currency.rate', N'Silver', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Dims', N'silver.currency_rate_timeseries', N'Databricks', N'Sequence', N'Blocked', N'stg.currency.rate (Bronze); dbo.DimDate (Silver)'),
(N'Finance', N'CurrencyRate.csv', N'silver.currency_rate_timeseries; dbo.DimDate', N'Gold', N'Batch B', N'Finance_Gold', N'dbo.DimCurrencyRate (or used in conversion)', N'Databricks / Synapse', N'Sequence', N'Blocked', N'silver.currency_rate_timeseries (Silver); dbo.DimDate (Silver)'),

COMMIT TRANSACTION;
